text:
Hi all - niche request: I'm looking to connect with content marketers from companies in the creator economy space - ideally catering to Instagram influencers.

I head up content at Notch, a VC-backed startup building an insurance product for digital assets, starting with Instagram accounts (<https://www.get-notch.com/instagram>). Looking for some awesome content marketing collabs!

attachments.fallback: Instagram Insurance for creators | Notch Insurance
attachments.text: Get Notch Instagram Insurance for influencers and creators, includes loss of income and account retrieval services. Cover your Instagram account against hacks and bans so you can focus on creating.
attachments.title: Instagram Insurance for creators | Notch Insurance
